definitions: a cell, gland, or organ that secretes a substance

examples.text: the adrenal glands secrete hormones that regulate metabolism

shortDefinitions: cell, gland, or organ that secretes substance

definitions: a person who secretes blood-group antigens (of the ABO system) in body fluids such as saliva and semen

examples.text: a person who is an ABH secretor will secrete antigens according to their blood group

shortDefinitions: person who secretes blood-group antigens with their bodily fluids
